workflow_validation_and_testing.overview:
Comprehensive validation framework for dual workflow system functionality defined in: ../../sdlc/shared/orchestrator-validation-testing.md
Includes test scenarios, integration validation, and troubleshooting procedures.
workflow_validation_and_testing.includes: - Validation Checklist (system integration and mode coordination validation) - Test Scenarios (new feature/enhancement workflows, existing updates, edge cases) - Integration Testing (JIRA MCP and Git workflow integration) - Performance Validation (response time benchmarks) - Troubleshooting Procedures (common issues with diagnosis and resolution) - Validation Commands (system health checks) - Deployment Validation (pre/post deployment checklists) - Monitoring and Maintenance (key metrics and procedures)
